thread.title: Despite Obama's passion, little movement seen on guns
thread.title_full: Despite Obama's passion, little movement seen on guns - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Despite Obama's passion, little movement seen on guns
text: For the 15th time in his nearly seven years in office, President Obama last week consoled the nation and demanded action on gun-control legislation â€” but America's most recent mass shooting likely will serve as another reminder that the president's bully pulpit simply isn't powerful enough to drive change on ... ...
